description: Incredible opportunity! We present to you this magnificent independent House / Chalet, recently built and less than two years old. Its optimal differential elements and high qualities make it a unique option on the market. With exclusive materials and an orientation to the sun that provides a lot of light, you will fall in love with this property from the first moment. Distributed over two floors plus a basement, it has all the amenities you can imagine. On the main floor, you will find a large entrance porch, a hallway, a large living room and a bright kitchen. In addition, it has an ironing room and a main bathroom. It also has a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and dressing room, as well as a spiral staircase that will take you to the upper floor. On the upper floor, you will find two bedrooms with bathrooms, two dressing rooms and two terraces, ideal for relaxing and enjoying the views. In total, this property has four bedrooms and four bathrooms, ensuring more than enough space for the entire family. In the basement, you will find an English patio, underfloor heating and geothermal cooling, offering exceptional comfort in all seasons of the year. In addition, it has a prepared barbecue area, automatic irrigation and a concrete and insulating structure that guarantees maximum energy efficiency. It also has solar panels and an electric car charger installed. Without forgetting the outdoor areas, this property has a heated salt pool, a jacuzzi with jets and a sun area to enjoy the good weather. With a constructed area of 343 m² and useful areas of 340 m², this house offers more than enough space for all your needs. In addition, it has built-in wardrobes, a storage room and a garage space. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this wonderful property. Contact us now for more information!

Luxurious dettached house in Alpedrete A combination of design and modernity defines this single-family house presented by Engel & Völkers next to the Sierra de Guadarrama in the municipality of Alpedrete. We are facing the purest and perfect symbiosis between the modern and the rustic, with class and elegance. House of 334 square metres with two differentiated houses and independent entrances.  In the main house, the large living room is striking, where the walls have been replaced by enormous windows, thus providing great natural light. From here, you have access to a second lounge-dining room with the kitchen built into it, which provides uniqueness and double functionality to this room. Open spaces connected to each other, but well differentiated by a distinguished furniture, where the elegant decoration turns every corner of this property into a lavish display of luxury and art.  On the other side of the house, there is a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and direct access to the porch as well as a second bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Large windows surround the entire house where the green of the lawn is reflected and perfectly combined with the elegant and luxurious interior decoration, providing freshness and refinement. Great and very high construction quality outdoors and indoors, along with a high-quality decoration, turn this single-family house into a high-class place where you can live all year round  On the ground floor, there is a well-equipped one-bedroom apartment. A plot of 2100 square metres with football pitch, parking, swimming pool and gardens perfectly maintained complete the visit to this wonderful house. Alpedrete is a municipality belonging to the Community of Madrid, famous for its quarries, from which granite was extracted to build, among other monuments the Monasterio del Escorial, el Palacio de Oriente and El Valle de los Caídos. At the moment it has more than 14,500 registered inhabitants plus another 4,000 or so who live there without being registered yet. Alpedrete, together with its Los Negrales neighbourhood, has now become one of the most important places in the Community of Madrid for culture, outdoor activities and rest. Known for years for its "renowned sillar stone quarries", its main attraction is its proximity to the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park (it is considered the "Gateway" of the latter) and the city of Madrid, capital of Spain.

Magnificent villa in the mountains of Madrid Detached villa in the most exclusive urbanization of Alpedrete, southeast facing, on four floors and with elevator. It has an elegant entrance hall, a large living, dining room, a spacious kitchen with breakfast area and bar. Underfloor heating in porcelain tile. Master bedroom with en suite bathroom on the first floor, service area with bedroom and bathroom. All windows are PVC and Climalit, with electric shutters, all overlooking the garden. The kitchen is connected to a large porch that in summer can be used as a dining area overlooking a wonderful garden, enjoying the enviable temperature of the mountain. The garden is flat, with automatic irrigation, natural grass, wooded with oaks, pines, cypresses, palm trees and fruit trees.  The swimming pool is of salt water and has a counter-current swimming system, surrounded by a nice wooden deck. Climbing the interior walnut stairs, we find four bright bedrooms with fitted closets, dressing room and terrace, and three bathrooms, one with whirlpool tub. Upstairs there is an attic with generous space for office, TV room and video games. In the basement we have a tool room and garage for 4 or 5 cars, with electric gate, heating machines and elevator, a beautiful cellar with bar and living room. The exterior of the villa, built in concrete, is lined on the first floor of Porriño stone, drainage of elimination of moisture, and the roof is black slate, with stainless steel gutters. The timeless architecture and design of this very elegant villa make this property a true dream home. The Mataespesa urbanization is the most exclusive in Alpedrete. It has a guardhouse (a few meters away) and 24 hour surveillance. Surrounded by green areas and natural areas in the foothills of the mountains, very close to the village, you can walk everywhere. In the urbanization there is the prestigious British Montessori School for children aged 1 to 18 years. Alpedrete has a health center, RENFE suburban train station (400 meters), transport bus network within the mountains and to Madrid. It has several public schools, restaurants and cafes, post office, stores, supermarkets, banks and sports facilities, private and municipal. It is located within a 5 minutes drive from the A-6, Colado Villalba and the General Hospital, 20 minutes from Navacerrada and the ski resort. For those who enjoy the mountain climate, outdoor sports such as hiking, horseback riding, cycling, skiing, motocross, nature and breathing fresh air, the northwestern mountains of Madrid is the ideal place that also offers a wide history and gastronomic offer.

Detached chalet in the Sierra de Alpedrete, a unique opportunity to enjoy life in nature without giving up the comforts of the city. With a high quality construction in stone, wood and ceramics. This property has an excellent location, with multiple exit routes to the A-6 in less than 10 minutes and excellent connectivity through public transport. In addition, you can walk to the health center, restaurants, parks and daycare centers in the area. Ideal for those who want to combine life in the mountains with proximity to the city. The house has two access points, a large living room with fluid distribution, a full kitchen, two bedrooms (one of them en suite) and two full bathrooms. On the ground floor, you will find a large hall, two bedrooms, a large office, a bathroom and two small rooms currently used as a cellar and wardrobe. The chalet also has a large, well-kept garden, with multiple amenities such as a mobile pergola, barbecue area, table, benches and storage sheds. The property is in excellent general condition, with the possibility of updating and a promising investment. Don't miss the opportunity to live in one of the most picturesque places in Madrid, surrounded by nature and with all the comforts. Community fees: €49. IBI: €1,097. 301 m² built, 228 m² useful, plot of 1,777 m², 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, terrace, balcony, storage rooms and garage.

Grupo Avanza is pleased to offer for sale or for rent this fabulous two-story villa, built on a 150-meter plot, plus another 76-meter plot. Each of the plots has its cadastral reference, but they are not sold separately. The main plot has a construction of two floors and 134 meters; The ground floor currently has a bar/restaurant license and the upper floor is for residential use or housing. The other plot has a 67-meter building that is currently in a demolished state and was used as a warehouse. The entire complex is very centrally located, with all services one step away and excellent communication. Infinite possibilities, both to build a single-family home, as apartments or as a bar-restaurant. Be sure to call us, we will be happy to provide you with more information and arrange a visit.

WE DO NOT CHARGE COMMISSION TO BUYERS House / Semi-detached house for sale with a privileged location near the urban center and with easy access to public transport (bus and train). This property is located in a very quiet area, ideal for those looking for peace and tranquility. The house has two floors and has a paved garden with space for a car, as well as a large shed-storage room. Upon entering, we find a glass hall that welcomes us. The living room is spacious and sunny, with a fireplace that gives it a cozy touch. From the living room, you can access the rear garden. The kitchen is spacious, furnished and comfortable, ideal for those who enjoy cooking. It also has a laundry room. On the ground floor, we find a bedroom with a full bathroom, perfect for guests or for those who prefer to have their room on this floor. On the upper floor, we find two bright and spacious bedrooms, one of them with access to a large terrace with views. There is also a full bathroom on this floor. In addition, the property has a third bedroom suite with an open terrace. The en-suite bathroom is spacious and complete, with a window that allows natural light to enter. The chalet has a top quality wood-colored PVC enclosure, which gives it beauty and spaciousness. Without a doubt, it is a property worth visiting. For more information, please contact Esmeralda. Main features: - Built area: 267 m² - Useful area: 172 m² - 4 bedrooms - 4 bathrooms - Terrace - balcony - Second hand/Good condition - Built-in wardrobes - Storage room - Year of construction: 1992 - Plot: 95 m² COME SEE IT YOU WILL LOVE IT EMERALD.

CAPITAL HOME ALPEDRETE SELLS FANTASTIC INDEPENDENT VILLA, IN THE BERROCALES URBANIZATION, AT THE CLOSEST ENTRANCE TO THE TOWN, WITH A PLOT AREA OF 1000m2 WITH SWIMMING POOL, IN WHICH A 324m2 CONSTRUCTION HAS BEEN BUILT WITH SOLAR PANELS, DISTRIBUTED OVER TWO FLOORS. The house is divided into two floors, each of 145m2, as a whole, it consists of a hall, full kitchen, living room, three bedrooms on the upper floor, with two full bathrooms, one of them en suite, passage area or office and on the ground floor we find a living room, two full bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, an office and a garage area with a toilet. IT IS DISTRIBUTED AS FOLLOWS; Firstly, we access the interior from a large terrace facing south-east, ideal for living with family, friends or creating a glassed-in space for winter.Next, we find the hall that leads on the left to the complete kitchen, with a lot of storage space, where a furniture distribution could be planned and a daily dining room could be arranged in it. Next, the living-dining room, with magnificent natural light and ideal windows, a very large one has been arranged next to the hall to generate even more natural light.We have a fireplace and dimensions of 35m2, where we can differentiate the dining area from the rest area and an opening has been made in the wall adjacent to a rear room so that the light penetrates between the rooms. Secondly, we move to the rest area, formed through a side hallway to the living room, where we find two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and north-west orientation, a complete bathroom with a hydromassage bathtub and a window to the outside that supplies the rooms. previously mentioned and the suite, with a full bathroom and a large built-in wardrobe. Finally, we move to the lower floor of the house, previously accessing it from stairs that connect with the living room on the upper floor and lead to an open space that can be used as a summer room, games area or office.In addition, on this floor there are two complete suites with a bathroom, built-in wardrobes and exterior windows, as well as a small room ideal for use as an office. We also have the garage area, where we located a guest toilet with capacity for a large vehicle and direct access to the garden. REGARDING THE MAIN CHARACTERISTICS OF THE HOUSING; We have in the garden area a garage with capacity for two vehicles, a completely updated exterior electrical system, a swimming pool with a Poseidon brand salt chlorination purifier, solar shower, changed gutters, solar panels and a fenced area at the back of the house, that can be adapted to the buyer's taste. Of the house we find exterior carpentry made of vinyl vinyl in wood, tilt and turn, in addition to double exterior carpentry in several rooms, the interior made of wood and the exterior made of aluminum, interior carpentry of pine wood, recently changed porcelain floors in gray tones, newly painted walls. smoothed and painted, fully operational fireplace, completely renovated electrical system, with independent electrical panel for the solar panel system. The urbanization has a Social Club, where you can purchase a share and have common areas such as a restaurant, paddle tennis court, tennis, basketball, two swimming pools and a social area. As for services, thanks to its location, we have the entrance to the town less than 2 minutes by car, where the bus stop is located with the Cercanías Renfe lines with line C8 and the A-6 highway crossing the urbanization less than 5 minutes away.

We must highlight its unbeatable location, very quiet area, with all the services close to the property. A few meters from supermarkets, close to a school, shopping centers, Renfe, with a convenient Ap6 exit. Semi-detached house, in perfect condition, three floors. On the ground floor, it is distributed in a large hall, a dining room of approx. 35m2, an office room, a large furnished kitchen and a complete bathroom. First floor; It has a distributor, four bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and a fantastic dressing room. Second floor: Diaphanous attic room with fireplace of more than 40m2 approx, with access to a solarium terrace, fully glazed with wonderful views and very sunny. It has a patio of more than three hundred meters approx. aluminum windows with climalit, natural gas heating.
Detached Villa for sale in Alpedrete, with 151 m², 5 rooms and 3 bathrooms and Swimming pool.

description: Great opportunity in Alpedrete This spacious villa is located in the exclusive Valdencina urbanization, approximately 1 km from the center of Alpedrete, it was built in 1981, it is bright, fresh, ideal for summer vacations and weekends or to move all year. With a constructed area of approximately 261 m2 on a wonderful flat plot of 1,592 m2, has a beautiful garden consolidated with automatic irrigation, a variety of trees, a legalized well, large pool and tennis court for the most sporty. Before entering the house we have a comfortable terrace overlooking the garden and swimming pool, then an entrance hall connected on one side to a wide living room and dining room with fireplace and on the other side a large living room with which you could used as a bedroom with bathroom en suite. At the end of the corridor, we find a fully equipped kitchen with access to a small balcony and a room. An open staircase leading to the level superior, with 4 cozy bedrooms each with a terrace with beautiful clear views and fitted wardrobes. The house has a basement with game room and multipurpose room and garage for 2 cars. A consolidated garden with beautiful trees, automatic irrigation and a well legalized, a beautiful pool with Gres porcelain cladding Alpedrete is a municipality belonging to the Community of Madrid, famous for its quarries, from which granite was extracted to build, among others, monuments such as the Monastery of El Escorial, the Palace of the Orient and the Valley of the Fallen.  It currently has more than 14,500 registered inhabitants plus approximately 4,000 more who live there seasonally. Alpedrete has become one of the most important towns in the Community of Madrid in terms of culture, outdoor activities and relaxation. Known for years for its renowned ashlar stone quarries, its main attraction is its proximity to the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park, being considered as "the eastern gateway". The urbanization of Valdencina is highly appreciated for the large size of its plots and the proximity to both the urban center and the accessibility to the A6 and the Navacerrada road. The regional hospital is very close.

Studio Alpedrete S.L Sells unique and exclusive independent villa in the residential area of Mataespesa! Magnificent opportunity to live in one of the most beautiful and pleasant areas of the town. It is a luxurious independent villa located in one of the most coveted urbanizations of Alpedrete due to its tranquility and its large extensions of green areas and adjoining natural landscapes.The house has been built with a robust construction, with modern exposed brick architecture and with qualities that will make you really enjoy each stay of the property.It is a plot of 1,175m2 with 427m2 built offering four bedrooms with their respective en-suite bathrooms, as well as a room on the ground floor.It consists of two entrances, one on the main façade where we find the interior garage with capacity for two cars and direct access to the interior of the house, and another entrance at the rear for direct access to the garden areas, as well as other exterior rooms. On the main floor we have a reception hall with views of the interior garden that brings a lot of light to the entire house, a courtesy toilet, a bedroom on the ground floor, as well as a large living room divided into two independent rooms, one of them with a fireplace and both with access straight to the garden.In addition, it contains another room exclusively intended as a dining room with a large capacity, and directly connected to the kitchen and the hall.As for the kitchen, there is also space large enough for an office, a cupboard, as well as a division that contains a complete bathroom with a shower tray and another additional sink with a direct door to an outdoor area used as a clothesline.As soon as we go outside, we find a door that leads to a small room with a built-in wardrobe and sink that can be used as a storage room for garden furniture or even as an office.It is worth noting the existence of the cellar/games room located in the semi-basement floor with access from the interior door of the garage, which also contains the room for the aerothermal installation. The upper floor is divided into two wings.On the left we have a bedroom with two built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom with a shower.Following is the master bedroom with its own dressing room, a pleasant terrace with views of the garden and a complete bathroom with shower and bathtub.Regarding the right wing we find another two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, both with en-suite bathroom with shower and one of them also with a terrace. Regarding the exterior spaces, we emphasize the wonderful salt chlorination pool, the interior garage with capacity for two cars and a direct ramp to the exterior with automated doors; a built-in barbecue with a rear storage shed for garden furniture and other maintenance items, as well as a fantastic sunny area that can be used to install any type of gazebo. Lastly, we refer to the stupendous energy efficiency of the building, which has an aerothermal system, hot-cold underfloor heating, cellulose insulation on interior ceilings, as well as an extensive installation of photovoltaic panels that make the house fully self-sufficient. We highlight the unbeatable location of the house due to its proximity to the Montessori School, the municipality's Renfe station (line C8), bus lines to Madrid-Moncloa (681), Hospital Puerta de Hierro (685) and Hospital General Collado Villalba (680) and just eight hundred meters walk from the center of the municipality where other essential services are found. Undoubtedly a home where you will enjoy a great quality of life, in a very peaceful and familiar area.

Secondly, we access the rest area arranged on a long hallway, on the left the full bathroom, with a bathtub in this case and a window to a patio of lights that the house also has two bedrooms facing west, with closets. built-in and ample space to have a 1.35m or 1.50m bed plus a desk or study space.We have a third room ideal as an extra bedroom, study room, games area, office or storage area as in this case. Next, we cover a space that connects with the back of the construction currently used as an office or work area, where first we contemplate a transition area and subsequently a large independent apartment, composed of a living room with direct access to the garden, a separate bedroom and a full bathroom with a shower tray. description: Residencial La Bellota is an exclusive development that consists of an urbanization with a green area and swimming pool and 9 single-family homes (1 individual chalet and 8 semi-detached chalets) located in a privileged location north of the Community of Madrid, Alpedrete. An ideal place to enjoy a wide variety of activities and nature surrounded by family and our loved ones, so we will know the effect of A DIFFERENT WAY OF LIVING within the singular beauty of being in a location like Alpedrete. description: THIS CHALET IS SPECIAL BECAUSE: It is located in a quiet, beautiful and well-connected area, it has a bus stop, daycare, veterinarian and nursing home; and less than 1km from all the necessary services. For greater comfort, the house is very close to a medical center and schools. DESCRIPTION: This chalet has three floors, distributed in a spacious and bright living room with a separate dining room connected to a fully furnished kitchen equipped with appliances, five bedrooms, all of them with built-in wardrobes, three complete bathrooms, three functional toilets and a 70 m² cellar with an area games, kitchen and toilet. In addition, the chalet has several terraces, so you can enjoy the good weather. The property is all exterior, with a private garden where you will take advantage of the good weather and a private pool to cool off in summer, as well as a gazebo, bar and toilet. This chalet is in an excellent location with access to two streets, it has a closed garage with capacity for four cars and an exterior with capacity for another four cars, it has a woodshed and storage room, so you can take advantage of all the space in the house. IT IS IMPORTANT TO KNOW THAT: As for the qualities, this chalet has thermal and acoustic insulation, aerothermal heating with Daikin brand underfloor heating, air conditioning, solar panels, double glazed PVC exterior carpentry, porcelain floors that are easy to maintain and highly resistant, and automatic doors. in the garage and pedestrian. It has a garden that has an area of fruit trees, natural grass and a dry garden with automatic irrigation. All construction with PREMIUM qualities. It has a subrogable mortgage with a very low fixed interest rate. Facing south, it is a very sunny house in the central hours of the day. Adapted for people with reduced mobility since all the main rooms are on the same floor, without having to climb stairs, it has ramps for strollers and wheelchairs for more comfort AROUND: This house is located in a quiet and well-connected area, it has a bus stop, daycare, veterinarian and nursing home; and less than 1km from all the necessary services. For greater comfort, the house is very close to a medical center and schools. Just a stone's throw from the wooded areas of the Sierra de Guadarrama. rama.

WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER Are you looking for a spacious, comfortable and well-located house? Then don't miss this semi-detached house for sale in one of the best areas of Alpedrete.Magnificent semi-detached house for sale, with four bedrooms, four bathrooms and a toilet and a spacious attic, urbanization with swimming pool.Live in nature It is a three-story semi-detached house, located in the Hórreo VI Urbanization in the Municipality of Alpedrete, 45 km from Madrid on the A6.The house is built on a 225 m2 plot and the constructed area is 238 m2 registered in the Cadastre. THIS HOUSE IS SPECIAL: Because of its surroundings, since it is located next to a pasture, where you can breathe fresh air, enjoy peace, tranquility and disconnect from everyday life.Being able to walk alone or with someone, and take our pet out. DISTRIBUTION: The house has two floors built above ground and attic, as well as a semi-basement. Main floor: It consists of a hall, a guest toilet, a bedroom/office, a living room with fireplace and access to the back of the chalet. First Floor: It is distributed in three double bedrooms and a balcony included, in the master bedroom and another in the adjoining bedroom.The main one en suite with a full bathroom and balcony.Another full bathroom that serves the two remaining bedrooms.A bathroom with a bathtub.and the other with a shower tray. Lower Covered Floor: It consists of an open-plan loft with independent access that has a Velux window and a full bathroom. Semi-basement floor: Where the kitchen, pantry, a fourth bathroom, storage room and garage are located. QUALITIES: Aluminum exterior carpentry with double glazing.Natural wood doors. Wood and stoneware floors in bathrooms.Smooth walls except for three bedrooms.Insulation of the attic with a wooden covered ceiling.Hot water supply and natural gas heating, in addition to the fireplace in the living room IT IS IMPORTANT TO KNOW THAT: The house has been renovated, the kitchen is on the basement floor.That the attic has independent access through a door located in the staircase, which allows privacy and independence between the different rooms.No community fees.That the bus stop is next to the urbanization.That Alpedrete has a Renfe Station 5 minutes from the home, ideal for people who currently have the option of working at home, since, both due to the distribution and the number of rooms, it allows you to combine family life with daily work. COMMUNICATIONS: Buses with communication lines to Madrid and Villalba.Renfe Alpedrete and Los Negrales 5 minutes walk and 10 minutes from the A6 COMMERCE AND SERVICES: In addition to all the diversity of services that the Municipality itself has, the urbanization is located 5 minutes from the heart of Villalba and Planet-leisure. HOSPITALS: 10 minutes away is the General Hospital of Villalba SCHOOLS: Alpedrete, along with the surrounding Municipalities, have a wide range of Public and Private Schools.

Don't miss this spectacular and quiet semi-detached house/chalet in Alpedrete! With a bus stop nearby and a train station just 1 km away, this property has a privileged location near the town centre. The kitchen, spacious and open to the living room, has been expanded and improved, creating a perfect space to enjoy with the family. The bright and cozy living room has a fireplace and a dining area, with direct access to the beautiful garden. On the main floor, you will find 3 bright bedrooms, including 1 en-suite bedroom with a large bathroom and window, and 1 additional bathroom for the two adjoining rooms. In addition, there is a large attic with a large window, perfect for converting into an additional space with a large bedroom with its bright bathroom. The garden of this property offers several spaces to enjoy outdoors, including a swimming pool on one side and a covered gazebo on the other side. In addition, it has a room with a glass enclosure on the side of the house. Automatic awning and numerous improvements and reforms. The garage with capacity for 2 large cars and entrance through a gate and side, this 2-story home will surprise you. The entrance door is new, armored and highly secure, giving you peace of mind and protection. Don't miss the opportunity to visit this wonderful property! For more information, contact Esmeralda at Main features: - 250 m² built / 249 m² useful - 4 bedrooms / 3 bathrooms - Built-in wardrobes and storage room - Second hand / Good condition - Year of construction: 2000 - Natural gas heating / Fireplace - South orientation - 500 m² plot - Garage space for 2 cars - Energy class E Energy consumption - CO2 emissions class E Emissions.

Magnificent house on one floor in Los Berrocales, one of the most demanded urbanizations in Alpedrete. THIS HOUSE IS SPECIAL Because it is close to the Sierra de Guadarrama Natural Park, a place full of routes to explore and where you can enjoy magnificent places, practice sports or walk with the family, an idyllic place to enjoy the Sierra de Madrid. The urbanization has a Social Club, where you can buy a share and enjoy the common elements of your own. The house is located on the main avenue of the Urb.very close to the Social Club and with excellent communication, with direct entrance and exit to the A6, very close to the town of Alpedrete and a 5-minute walk from the Cercanías station. DISTRIBUTION The house consists of an entrance hall, a living-dining room on two levels, ideal to develop a dining area and a seating area next to the fireplace and access to the terrace, an independent kitchen, a pantry, 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and the main one en suite, Finally, another full bathroom for the rest of the house.It has a total of 140m2. IT IS IMPORTANT TO KNOW THAT That the plot has 1009m2 and that it is surrounded by a comfortable garden with many possibilities and great privacy in a privileged environment, as well as a 20m2 garage.but it also has a large area where to locate the pool or simply as a green area and we located a well that feeds the entire irrigation system of the garden. The house is located on the main avenue of the Urbanization very close to the Social Club and with excellent communication, with direct entrance and exit to the A6, very close to the town of Alpedrete and also to the train station within the same urbanization and a five minute walk. COMMUNICATIONS Bus stop with direct communication lines to Madrid, Collado Villalba and all the towns of the mountains, at the two entrances of the Urbanization.Renfe Cercanías station 5 minutes walk from the house and 2 minutes to join the A6 BUSINESS AND SERVICES In addition to all the diversity of services that the Municipality of Alpedrete itself has; Mercadona, ALDI, BM 3 minutes by car or 9 minutes on foot, pharmacy 4 minutes, restaurants, bars, shops, everything you need within a few minutes walk. LEISURE 4 minutes from the Cinemas and Planetocio Shopping Center in Collado Villalba Between 20 minutes by car from the shopping and leisure centers of El Carralero, Heron City, Las Rozas Village and Gran Plaza 2. HOSPITALS 5 minutes away is the General Hospital of Villalba, 15 minutes from HM Torrelodones and 25m from La Zarzuela or Nisa de Aravaca hospitals. COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES This property is located in one of the areas of Madrid with the greatest offer of public, concerted and private schools. 2 minutes away is the Montessori school and 7 minutes away from Los Agustinos Also public and private university campuses; such as the Campus of the Carlos III University in Colmenarejo, 18 minutes by car or the Nebrija University in La Berzosa, 12 minutes by car We do NOT charge commissions to the buyer and we can help you with financing. Excellent opportunity to rehabilitate a villa in one of the most demanded urbanizations in the Sierra. Basic characteristics •Independent house or chalet •160 m² built •3 rooms •2 bathrooms •Plot of 1,009 m² •Second hand/good condition •Built in 1980 •Individual heating: Natural gas •well equipment •Garden Energy certificate •contributed.

Do you want to live in a unique environment in the mountains just 30 minutes from Madrid? This independent chalet built on a corner plot, surrounded by nature, meets all the requirements to become your new home, escaping the noise of the big city where you can enjoy a new lifestyle, being, on the other hand, a 15-minute walk away. from the town of Alpedrete. It is located on a plot of approximately 1200 m2, with a swimming pool, several garden areas, a carriage entrance with a ramp to the garage, a front porch at the main entrance and another porch in the kitchen area with easy access to the pool. From the porch, you access through the main door to a hall that distributes several rooms: a large living-dining room surrounded by windows, a kitchen with an office, a large bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a complete bathroom en suite and stairs to the upper floor and the lower one. The staircase goes up to the first floor where there is a hallway that leads to four large double bedrooms, one of them with a terrace of approximately 10 m2 with excellent views of the Madrid mountains, a complete bathroom with a bathtub and a toilet.All these rooms are partially attic, which adds a special charm to the rest areas. Going down the stairs, we reach the garage with space for three/four cars, a full bathroom, a space that could be used as a cellar, games room, storage room...The diesel boiler is also housed on this floor. The plot offers many possibilities to design different landscape spaces and has both young and old trees. The Mataespesa urbanization is a colony of very low-density villas (unrepeatable today), which contributes its imprint to the landscape with its garden and well-developed areas.It is the most exclusive in Alpedrete.It has a security booth (a few meters away) and 24-hour patrol.In the urbanization there is the prestigious British Montessori School and the Mataespesa School for private education. Alpedrete has a health center, RENFE commuter train station (500 meters), transport bus network within the mountains and to Madrid, several public schools, fine dining restaurants and cafes, post office, shops, supermarkets, banking entities and sports facilities, private and municipal. Ideal environment for those who enjoy mountain air, outdoor sports such as hiking, cycling, skiing, motocross, the northwest mountains of Madrid are perfect. It is located 5 minutes by car from the A-6, Collado Villalba and the General Hospital, 20 minutes from Navacerrada and its ski resorts and connected by the M-505 highway to El Escorial.

HEADING HOME gives you the opportunity to live in one of the best areas of the Sierra de Guadarrama.Its altitude is 919 m and the distance from the community of Madrid is about 43 km.It is part of the so-called Hoya de Villalba and in its eastern part it is delimited by the hills of Cabeza Mediana, Telégrafo and Cañal.The municipal area is small, 12.6 km², and borders those of Collado Mediano, Moralzarzal, Collado Villalba and Guadarrama.The perimeter of the municipal area measures 16 km. ITS DISTRIBUTION: This magnificent cozy, bohemian and comfortable duplex offers you tranquility and privacy.We begin the visit through the main door that gives access to a hall from which we can see the dining room, to the right we enter the kitchen.If we continue the visit we access the dining room, living room and terrace with views of the pool and gardens. As we pass the hall we can see the staircase that takes us to the upper part, which consists of a storage area between floors, a bedroom and a full bathroom. The heating is natural gas The house has a storage room with direct access from the ground floor of the 9m2 building.and a 10m2 garage space. CHARACTERISTICS: 55 m2 house.Distributed over two floors, the main one of 37m2.the upper one of 18m2. 1 bedroom 1 bathroom Terrace built-in wardrobe Garage space of 10 m2. 9 m2 storage room.(on the ground floor, at the level of access to the portal). Common areas 25 m2. Communal swimming pool. Year of construction 2002 Individual heating: Natural gas 2nd floor Community of owners cost €40 IBI €295 Garbage €47 SERVICES, TRANSPORTATION AND ROADS: Education 7 Nursery Schools (1 public and 6 private). 4 public preschool and primary schools: Santa QuiterIa (bilingual), Los Negrales (bilingual), El Peralejo and Clara Campoamor. 1 secondary education institute (bilingual). 1 foreign school (private / subsidized) with two centers. Health Alpedrete has a Health Center, expanded on January 19, 2015, located in the Plaza de la Tauromaquia.It is also just 3 km from the new General Hospital of Villalba and just 20 minutes by car from the Puerta de Hierro University Hospital in Majadahonda. Transport By highway Coruña Highway A-6, exit 39 towards Collado Villalba.Detour Puerto de Navacerrada continuing on the M-601 and detour Alpedrete continuing on the M-619. Public transport Commuter train: C8b (stations: Los Negrales and Alpedrete). Intercity Bus: 680: Collado Villalba (Hospital)-Alpedrete-Cercedilla. 682: Madrid (Moncloa)-Alpedrete: night service on Fridays, Saturdays and holidays. 681: Madrid (Moncloa)-Alpedrete. 685: Puerta de Hierro-Majadahonda Hospital - Las Rozas-Torrelodones-Collado Villalba-Alpedrete-Guadarrama-Navacerrada. You'll love it! Contact me and come see it.

207 square meter semi-detached house in the prestigious Negrales neighborhood, between Collado Villalba and Alpedrete. Very well built home with a privileged location. In a few minutes walking you have access to all services, public transport (train and bus), school, supermarkets and shops. Park with numerous swings for children and sports fields right in front of the house and at the same time a quiet area close to ravines and natural paths. The car exit to the A6 is located a couple of minutes' drive away. The chalet has three very well used floors. Upon entering we find a front patio with covered parking for a car or van, of special interest being an electrical outlet available in this area to be able to recharge electric vehicles. Next we have the glass porch, which leaves extra space for multiple uses. We then enter a well-lit hall flanked by a practical full kitchen and a room next to a guest toilet. On the ground floor we also have a large, naturally well-lit living room with English-style windows and access to the garden, which is covered with artificial grass. Going up to the second floor we find three large bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom and another additional bathroom. All of them have a built-in wardrobe and plenty of space for furniture. The third floor has a huge open-plan multipurpose space and a room with a bathroom and a built-in wardrobe. The windows are double glazed, making the house very well insulated. Another advantage of housing is that you will live without having community fees. Take advantage of the opportunity to live in one of the best areas of the Sierra Oeste in a spacious, comfortable and functional home surrounded by tranquility. Natural gas heating and pellet stove on the ground floor.

DELANAORIVERA welcomes you to your new home in a private and quiet urbanization. This beautiful corner semi-detached house has exclusive access to a social club, 25 meter swimming pool, tennis court and common areas. The property is located in a well-connected area, with nearby services and means of transport. The house has a plot of 400m² and 287m² built, with a comprehensive renovation in 2015. Upon entering, you will find an entrance porch and a garden that surrounds the house. The interior is spacious and bright, with a living room divided into two rooms and a beautiful designer fireplace. The dining room is perfect for large gatherings of family and friends. The kitchen is furnished and equipped with appliances, and the living room has access to the garden, equipped with a wooden pergola, movie screen and built-in Argentine barbecue. The master bedroom suite has a fireplace, television, reading area and dressing room, and there are two further bedrooms and a bathroom. The basement has a dining room, bar, wine cellar and exposed stone so the little ones can play. There is an area for service or guests, with a bedroom, bathroom, laundry room and storage room. The property has natural gas heating and air conditioning, stoneware floors and exterior carpentry with thermal break. The interior carpentry is made of white lacquered wood and oak wood. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this beautiful property! We are a real estate agency with a 360º service. We have a team of professionals for renovations and we offer a mortgage service with the possibility of 100% financing, an alarm service with the best in security and a moving and furniture storage service with vehicles equipped to carry your merchandise safe and protected. We have a modular house manufacturing service and we carry out studies on all our plots to be able to carry out the construction of any of the available models.
